alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHERMAN COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ruleton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodland around 335 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 5 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
